alert.note: Alert for Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 04 at 2:10PM MDT until September 04 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL CUSTER...NORTHEASTERN FALL RIVER AND SOUTHWESTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 209 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Custer to 3 miles southwest of Buffalo Gap, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Custer, Buffalo Gap, Buffalo Corrals, Mount Coolidge, Stockade Lake, Blue Bell, Wind Cave National Park, and Custer State Park around 215 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Legion Lake, Fairburn, Black Hills Playhouse, Sylvan Lake, State Game Lodge, Center Lake, Mount Rushmore National Memorial, Black Elk Peak, Keystone, Horse Thief Lake and Keystone Wye. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
